page.title: 05Delcombe Caravan Site
page.content: This is just a basic site. Situated on Green Down above Delcombe Manor. The amenities are simply a cold water tap in the stable yard at Delcombe manor also a waste disposal pit on the site. As it is a certified site it is only used by Caravan Club members. The best approach is on the Bulbarrow road rom Milton Abbas where the caravan club sign is easily seen. It is not advisable to approach from the hilton Road. Set in eautiful country side with views looking down Delcombe valley to Milton abbey church, this is a lovely spot for a peaceful holiday and ideal for walking.
